name: Creature in the Glass
description:
A/D, Left/Right Arrow Keys, Middle Mouse Button - Rotate Camera

Left Click - Interact

(Click the edges of the book to turn the page!)

Made in 9 days for Godot Wild Jam 35! (Theme: Lost Tech)

All visuals & audio made original for this jam! Proud of you, team. <3

Ryan Hanson - Programmer Raine Doe - Visual Artist
Craig Alan Carroll - Composer, Sound Designer
